DOC.brief_summary: To collect supraventricular tachycardia ( SVT ) data develop test sense detection algorithms subcutaneous implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose SVT Collect study collect supraventricular tachycardia episode data develop test new sense detection algorithm future subcutaneous ICD .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 , legal age give consent specific national law country trial conduct Subjects indicate implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) /cardiac resynchronization therapy defibrillator ( CRTD ) implant ICD/CRTD changeout , OR subject indicate ICD/CRTD undergoing ablation electrophysiology ( EP ) study ( include Noninvasive EP Study [ NIPS ] ) Subjects willing provide Informed Consent Subjects ventricular pacing dependent Subjects preexist dual/triple chamber pacemaker ICD history atrioventricular ( AV ) block atrial pacing < 120 beat per minute ( BPM ) awake . Subjects unable tolerate elevate ventricular rate ( â‰¥170BPM ) Any condition precludes subject 's ability comply study requirement Enrollment concurrent study ( without prior study management approval ) may confound result study Subjects legally incompetent Subjects meet exclusion criterion require local law regulation ( e.g . age , breast feeding , etc ) .
